subject: Backup Data Corruption
description: Critical backup files are corrupted and cannot be restored. This affects disaster recovery capabilities and puts company data at risk. Multiple backup sets show corruption errors.
resolution: Restored from secondary backup location and implemented verification
resolution_steps: Identified corrupted backup files and extent of damage
Located secondary backup copies in offsite location
Verified integrity of secondary backup files
Restored critical data from secondary backup
Implemented backup verification and integrity checking
Tested restore procedures with sample data
prevention_measures: Implement automated backup verification and multiple backup locations
